official-title.#text:
To direct the Secretary of Transportation to assist
		  States to rehabilitate or replace certain bridges, and for other
		  purposes.

cosponsor.#text: Ms. Eddie Bernice Johnson of Texas

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following
			 bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text:
Strengthen And Fortify Existing Bridges Act of
			 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Assistance to

In
			 this section, the following definitions apply:

term.#tail:
means a bridge on a public road, without regard to
			 whether the bridge is on a Federal-aid highway.

text.#text:
The
			 term

term.#tail:
means a bridge that is structurally deficient,
			 functionally obsolete, or fracture critical.

text.#text: The term

term.#tail:
means, with respect to a bridge, a bridge with a
			 steel member in tension, or with a tension element, the failure of which would
			 likely cause a portion of the bridge or the entire bridge to collapse.

text.#text: The term

has significant load-carrying elements that

has a load capacity that is significantly

has a waterway opening causing frequent
			 flooding of the bridge deck and approaches resulting in significant traffic
			 interruptions.
